item.title: Categories Post
item.description: I’m a post with multiple categories in the frontmatter: categories = ["programming","lorem","pseudo"] Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. In mauris nulla, vestibulum vel auctor sed, posuere eu lorem. Aliquam consequat augue ut accumsan mollis. Suspendisse malesuada sodales tincidunt. Vivamus sed erat ac augue bibendum porta sed id ipsum. Ut mollis mauris eget ligula sagittis cursus. Aliquam id pharetra tellus. Pellentesque sed tempus risus. Proin id hendrerit ante. Vestibulum vitae urna ut mauris ultricies dignissim.

item.title: Hugo is for lovers
item.description: This is the summary Goto hugo releases and download the appropriate version for your os and architecture. Save it somewhere specific as we will be using it in the next step. More complete instructions are available at installing hugo
